about_the_game:
Salto Mortadella presents an intense precision platformer experience where players navigate through platforms, striving to ascend to the pinnacle. The game focuses on the art of jumping with sheer leg power, requiring players to master the skill for swift and confident leaps. Those who persevere through the challenging journey may uncover great mysteries and a rewarding achievement upon reaching the summit.

Key Features


  • Engage in high-stakes platforming with the only way forward being upward, and the primary adversary being oneself.
  • Charge, aim, and release to execute jumps, a seemingly simple yet skill-demanding action that requires extensive practice to perfect.
  • Embrace the mental challenge of selecting the optimal path, as the obvious route may not always be the most effective, with irreversible consequences once airborne.
  • Experience the thrill of a tough yet addictive gameplay loop that tests your resolve, with the potential for hours of suspenseful entertainment.

    Atmosphere


  • Immerse yourself in the distinctive rubber hose stylized world of Mr. Sausage, a character to both love and hate.
  • Enjoy classic graphics, snappy animations, hand-drawn backgrounds that complements the 1930s cartoon style.
  • Encounter an exceptional, dynamically adjusting Original Soundtrack.

    Challenge your skills, compete with friends, and prepare for an emotional rollercoaster as you question whether you possess the necessary prowess to conquer the formidable Salto Mortadella!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GhZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Brave Salto Mortadella's perilous heights! Navigate treacherous platforms, precarious ledges, and perilous jumps. A misstep means tumbling down. The stakes are high in this thrilling platforming adventure!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
